item.title: Leena add a quote by J K. Rowling
item.description: "I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me." -- J K. Rowling

item.title: Leena add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Leena add a quote by Pearl S. Buck
item.description: "Many people lose the small joys in the hope for the big happiness." -- Pearl S. Buck

item.title: Leena add a quote by Pearl Buck
item.description: "To know how to do something well is to enjoy it." -- Pearl Buck

item.title: Leena add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Leena add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Leena add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Leena add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Leena add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Leena add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
